type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.ExcludeRule
type.description: An ExcludeRule is used to describe transitive dependencies that should be excluded when resolving dependencies.

method.name: getGroup
method.description: The exact name of the organization or group that should be excluded.

method.name: getModule
method.description: The exact name of the module that should be excluded.

property.name: module
property.description: The exact name of the module that should be excluded.

property.name: group
property.description: The exact name of the organization or group that should be excluded.
